props.description: Content to be rendered inside ChatInput, usually `ChatInput.Actions` and `ChatInput.Field`.
props.title: children

props.description: Whether the ChatInput is focused for AI states.
props.title: aiFocused

props.description: Content to be rendered at both sides of the actions bar.
props.title: children

props.description:
Highlights the field to indicate its value was generated by AI.
Applies AI gradient border, white background and an AI focus ring.
props.title: aiGenerated

props.description: Number of lines to be rendered for the user to input text
props.title: lines

props.description: Controls intrinsic sizing behavior of the field. When true, the textarea will grow with content up to the maxLines limit (if provided) and then scroll.
props.title: autoGrow

props.description:
Caps the textarea visual height to the given number of lines.
When used together with autoGrow=true, the textarea will grow
with content up to this limit and then scroll.
props.title: maxLines

props.description:
Sets the minimum height of the textarea to the given number of lines.
The textarea will never shrink below this height, even when empty.
props.title: minLines

props.description:
Predefined appearance values for AI states. When `"ai-generative"` is passed,
the field displays the Nimbus AI generative border and focus ring.
props.title: appearance

props.description: Content to be rendered inside the popover, usually ChatInput.PopoverButton components.
props.title: content

color.description: The color property is used to set the color of the box.
color.title: color

justifyContent.description:
The justifyContent property defines how the browser distributes space between and around content items along
the main-axis of a flex container, and the inline axis of a grid container.
justifyContent.title: justifyContent

position.description: The position property sets how an box is positioned in a document.
position.title: position

top.description: The top property participates in setting the vertical position of a positioned box.
top.title: top

width.description: The width property specifies the width of a box's content area.
width.title: width

height.description: The height property specifies the height of a box's content area.
height.title: height

maxWidth.description: The max width property specifies the width of a box's content area.
maxWidth.title: maxWidth

maxHeight.description: The max height property specifies the height of a box's content area.
maxHeight.title: maxHeight

minWidth.description: The min width property specifies the width of a box's content area.
minWidth.title: minWidth

minHeight.description: The min height property specifies the height of a box's content area.
minHeight.title: minHeight

bottom.description: The bottom property participates in setting the vertical position of a positioned box.
bottom.title: bottom

left.description: The left property participates in specifying the horizontal position of a positioned box.
left.title: left

right.description: The right property participates in specifying the horizontal position of a positioned box.
right.title: right

flex.description: This is the shorthand for flexGrow, flexShrink and flexBasis combined.
flex.title: flex

flexShrink.description: This defines the ability for a flex item to shrink if necessary.
flexShrink.title: flexShrink

flexGrow.description: This defines the ability for a flex item to grow if necessary.
flexGrow.title: flexGrow

flexWrap.description: The flexWrap property sets whether flex items are forced onto one line or can wrap onto multiple lines.
flexWrap.title: flexWrap

order.description: The order property controls the order in which they appear in a flex container.
order.title: order

gridTemplateColumns.description: The gridTemplateColumns property defines the line names and track sizing functions of the grid columns.
gridTemplateColumns.title: gridTemplateColumns

gridTemplateAreas.description: The gridTemplateAreas property specifies named grid areas, establishing the cells in the grid and assigning them names.
gridTemplateAreas.title: gridTemplateAreas

gridTemplateRows.description: The gridTemplateRows property defines the line names and track sizing functions of the grid rows.
gridTemplateRows.title: gridTemplateRows

gridArea.description:
The gridArea shorthand property specifies a grid item's size and location within a grid by contributing a line,
a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement, thereby specifying the edges of its grid area.
gridArea.title: gridArea

alignItems.description:
The alignItems property sets the align-self value on all direct children as a group. In Flexbox, it controls the alignment of items on the Cross Axis.
In Grid Layout, it controls the alignment of items on the Block Axis within their grid area.
alignItems.title: alignItems

alignSelf.description:
The alignSelf property overrides a grid or flex item's align-items value. In Grid, it aligns the item inside the grid area.
In Flexbox, it aligns the item on the cross axis.
alignSelf.title: alignSelf

gridGap.description: The gridGap property sets the gaps between rows and columns. It is a shorthand for rowGap and columnGap.
gridGap.title: gridGap

pointerEvents.description: The pointerEvents property sets under what circumstances (if any) a particular graphic element can become the target of pointer events.
pointerEvents.title: pointerEvents

overflow.description: The overflow shorthand property sets the desired behavior for an box's overflow.
overflow.title: overflow

overflowX.description: The overflow-x property sets what shows when content overflows a block-level box's left and right edges.
overflowX.title: overflowX

overflowY.description: The overflow-y property sets what shows when content overflows a block-level box's top and bottom edges.
overflowY.title: overflowY

cursor.description: The cursor property sets the mouse cursor, if any, to show when the mouse pointer is over an box.
cursor.title: cursor

backgroundColor.description: The backgroundColor property sets the background color of the box.
backgroundColor.title: backgroundColor

borderRadius.description: The borderRadius property rounds the corners of an box's outer border edge.
borderRadius.title: borderRadius

borderWidth.description: The borderWidth property sets the width of an box's border.
borderWidth.title: borderWidth

borderTopWidth.description: The borderTopWidth property defines the width of the border at the top of a box.
borderTopWidth.title: borderTopWidth

borderBottomWidth.description: The borderBottomWidth property defines the width of the border at the bottom of a box.
borderBottomWidth.title: borderBottomWidth

borderLeftWidth.description: The borderLeftWidth property defines the width of the border at the left of a box.
borderLeftWidth.title: borderLeftWidth

borderRightWidth.description: The borderRightWidth property defines the width of the border at the right of a box.
borderRightWidth.title: borderRightWidth

borderWidthX.description: The borderWidthX shorthand property defines the width of the element's border on the left and right.
borderWidthX.title: borderWidthX

borderWidthY.description: The borderWidthY shorthand property defines the width of the element's border on the top and bottom.
borderWidthY.title: borderWidthY

borderColor.description: The borderColor property sets the color of the box's four borders.
borderColor.title: borderColor

borderStyle.description: borderStyle property sets the line style for all four sides of an box's border.
borderStyle.title: borderStyle

boxSizing.description: The boxSizing property sets how the total width and height of an box is calculated.
boxSizing.title: boxSizing

boxShadow.description: The boxShadow property adds shadow effects around an box's frame.
boxShadow.title: boxShadow

padding.description: The padding properties are used to generate space around an box's content area.
padding.title: padding

paddingTop.description: The paddingTop property sets the height of the padding area on the top of an box.
paddingTop.title: paddingTop

paddingBottom.description: The paddingBottom property sets the height of the padding area on the bottom of an box.
paddingBottom.title: paddingBottom

paddingLeft.description: The paddingLeft property sets the width of the padding area to the left of an box.
paddingLeft.title: paddingLeft

paddingRight.description: The paddingLeft property sets the width of the padding area to the right of an box.
paddingRight.title: paddingRight

margin.description: The margin shorthand property sets the margin area on all four sides of an box.
margin.title: margin

marginTop.description: The marginTop property sets the margin area on the top of an box.
marginTop.title: marginTop

marginBottom.description: The marginBottom property sets the margin area on the bottom of an box.
marginBottom.title: marginBottom

marginLeft.description: The marginLeft property sets the margin area on the left side of an box.
marginLeft.title: marginLeft

marginRight.description: The marginRight property sets the margin area on the right side of an box.
marginRight.title: marginRight

transitionTimingFunction.description: The transitionTimingFunction property sets how intermediate values are calculated for CSS properties being affected by a transition effect.
transitionTimingFunction.title: transitionTimingFunction

transitionProperty.description: The transitionProperty property sets the CSS properties to which a transition effect should be applied.
transitionProperty.title: transitionProperty

transitionDelay.description: The transitionDelay property specifies the duration to wait before starting a property's transition effect when its value changes.
transitionDelay.title: transitionDelay

transitionDuration.description: The transitionDuration property sets the length of time a transition animation should take to complete. By default, the value is 0s, meaning that no animation will occur.
transitionDuration.title: transitionDuration

zIndex.description: The zIndex property specifies the stack order of the box.
zIndex.title: zIndex

background.description: The background property sets the background of the box.
background.title: background

backgroundImage.description: The backgroundImage property sets one or more background images on an element.
backgroundImage.title: backgroundImage

backgroundPosition.description:
The backgroundPosition property sets the initial position for each background image.
The position is relative to the position layer set by background-origin.
backgroundPosition.title: backgroundPosition

backgroundBlendMode.description:
The backgroundBlendMode property sets how an element's background images should blend with each
other and with the element's background color.
backgroundBlendMode.title: backgroundBlendMode

backgroundRepeat.description: The backgroundRepeat property sets how background images are repeated. A background image can be repeated along the horizontal and vertical axes, or not repeated at all.
backgroundRepeat.title: backgroundRepeat

textDecoration.description: The textDecoration shorthand property sets the appearance of decorative lines on text.
textDecoration.title: textDecoration

backgroundSize.description: The backgroundSize property sets the size of the element's background image. The image can be left to its natural size, stretched, or constrained to fit the available space.
backgroundSize.title: backgroundSize

p.description: The p shorthand property sets the margin area on all four sides of an box.
p.title: p

pl.description: The pl shorthand property sets the width of the padding area to the left of an box.
pl.title: pl

pr.description: The pl shorthand property sets the width of the padding area to the right of an box.
pr.title: pr

pt.description: The pt shorthand property sets the height of the padding area on the top of an box.
pt.title: pt

pb.description: The pb shorthand property sets the height of the padding area on the botton of an box.
pb.title: pb

px.description: The px shorthand property defines the width of the left and right padding area of a box.
px.title: px

py.description: The py pt shorthand property sets the height of the padding area at the top and bottom of a box.
py.title: py

paddingX.description: The paddingX shorthand property defines the width of the left and right padding area of a box.
paddingX.title: paddingX

paddingY.description: The paddingY pt shorthand property sets the height of the padding area at the top and bottom of a box.
paddingY.title: paddingY

m.description: The m shorthand property sets the margin area on all four sides of an box.
m.title: m

mr.description: The mr property sets the margin area on the right side of an box.
mr.title: mr

ml.description: The ml property sets the margin area on the left side of an box.
ml.title: ml

mt.description: The mt property sets the margin area on the top of an box.
mt.title: mt

mb.description: The marginBottom property sets the margin area on the bottom of an box.
mb.title: mb

mx.description: The mx property defines the margin area on the left and right side of a box.
mx.title: mx

my.description: The my property defines the margin area on the top and bottom of a box
my.title: my

marginX.description: The marginX property defines the margin area on the left and right side of a box.
marginX.title: marginX

marginY.description: The marginY property defines the margin area on the top and bottom of a box
marginY.title: marginY

fontSize.description: The fontSize property sets the size of the box.
fontSize.title: fontSize

fontWeight.description: The fontWeight property sets how thick or thin characters in box should be displayed.
fontWeight.title: fontWeight

lineHeight.description: The lineHeight property specifies the line height of the box.
lineHeight.title: lineHeight

textAlign.description: The textAlign property specifies the horizontal alignment of box.
textAlign.title: textAlign

scrollbarWidth.description: The scrollbarWidth property specifies the width of the scrollbar.
scrollbarWidth.title: scrollbarWidth

props.description: The trigger element that opens the popover, usually an IconButton.
props.title: children

props.description: Icon element to be displayed before the text.
props.title: icon

props.description: The text content of the button.
props.title: text
